author: info@hypebeast.com (HYPEBEAST), HYPEBEAST
title: Ubisoft Is Giving Away Free Games to Encourage People to Stay at Home
description: Ubisoft is encouraging people to stay at home and steer clear from the COVID-19 pandemic by offering people free games, trials, discounts, and other offers. The game publisher is currently running a month-long campaign that is giving various goods to stay-at-…
